text.name: info3
text.text: Quake is a series of first-person shooter video games developed by

text.name: info4
text.text: id Software. The series is composed of the eponymous game from

text.name: info5
text.text: 1996 and its nonlinear, standalone sequels which vary in setting

text.name: info6
text.text: and plot. Quake was created as a successor franchise to id's highly

text.name: info7
text.text: successful Doom series, which had begun in 1993.
